summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3768 for the improvement of the alley in block "G", W.N. Bell's 4th Addition, being the alley extending from Eagle Street to Warren Place, between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46367, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
